remarks: The value of a sum over a nonempty finite set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
fsum.1 $e |- ( k = ( F ` n ) -> B = C ) $.
fsum.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fsum.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : ( 1 ... M ) -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
fsum.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsum.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. ( 1 ... M ) ) -> ( G ` n ) = C ) $.
fsum $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B = ( seq 1 ( + , G ) ` M ) ) $.
$d A k n $.
$d B n $.
$d C k $.
$d F k n $.
$d G k n $.
$d M k n $.
$d k n ph $.
